item.description:
Hiello meetup friends we will be meeting at the VFW in Portsmouth at 8 pm to dance the night away in celebration. So come out and join the Seacoast's only authentic New Orleans-style band (Jumbo Circus Peanuts) for a multi-purpose pre-Fat-Tuesday "Samedi Gras" Party (also designed to celebrate Candlemas, Imbolc, Ground Hog Day, Tom Smothers' Birthday and Super Bowl Eve.) We will be meeting there at 8 pm. $5.

We will also be meeting earlier at "The Friendly Toast " for dinner at 6 pm or you could just meet us for dancing at the VFW (they are both walking distance of each other). There address is: 121 Congress St Portsmouth, NH 03801
(603) 430-2154

If you have any questions you can call me at 603-509-2907
See you there
Peter
item.why: You'll be joining other meetup group members
item.name: Dinner and Dancing Night
